Behind the Scenes

This portfolio wasn’t just built—it was carefully crafted with intention, iteration, and a whole lot of trial and error.

Project Description

This is a fully responsive cybersecurity portfolio website built in VSCode using Astro, React, and Tailwind CSS. It showcases my skills and projects through an intuitive design with dynamic views and easy navigation optimized for both mobile and desktop. The site focuses on clean, maintainable code, leveraging AI tools to speed up development while ensuring I deeply understand and control every part of the project.

Phase Key Actions & Decisions Outcome
1. Project Bootstrapping Create Astro project, minimal cleanup, remove README.md, init Git Clear Astro skeleton structure
2. Core Styling Install Tailwind, update tailwind.config.cjs , postcss.config.js , global styles in src/styles/global.css Tailwind utilities available project-wide
3. React Integration Install @astrojs/react Ready to drop in JSX components
4. Netlify Adapter Install @astrojs/netlify, update astro.config.mjs Auto builds use Netlify-friendly output
5. Global Layout Created Layout.astro with shared header/footer Consistent UI framework
